=======
History
=======


0.1.0 (2020-07-02)
------------------

* First release on PyPI.


0.1.1 (2020-07-04)
------------------

* Working Github actions, tox and flake8.


0.2.0 (2020-09-01)
------------------

* BBox intersection over union (IOU)
* Coverage
* Black code formatting


0.3.0 (2020-10-25)
------------------

* BBox non maxima suppression (NMS)
* Performance tests
